resources.string: Click on the navigation tabs below to learn more.
Try our delicately crafted salmon sashimi with a rich selection of vegetables according to your needs, dipped in vinegar red pepper oil and sprinkled with salad leaves on top for a fulfilling taste!

Indulge in your love for sushi, and try something new! We present to you rolls of salmon sushi with a ball of vinegar rice encasing the delicacy awaiting for you. Feel free to enjoy with a side wasabi and soy sauce, some salt, and a bit of citrus!

Reward yourself with a tasty seaweed salad, made of wakame and delicious seaweeds packed with many other nutrient-dense ingredients, such as sesame seeds, leafy greens, ginger, edamame, daikon radish, shredded carrots, and corn. The best part? It\'s healthy!
